name: Peaches with Spiced Vanilla Syrup
description: A great dessert when peaches are in season, or use frozen peach slices to enjoy this recipe year-round.

ingredients.name: large, ripe peaches, halved and pitted

preparation: Combine water, sugar, and Apple Pie Spice in a Multipurpose Pot. Bring to a boil over medium heat and simmer until sugar dissolves. Remove from heat and add vanilla extract.
While syrup is reducing, arrange peaches in a Multipurpose Steamer. Cook on high for 5â€“7 min.
Place two peach halves on each dessert plate, drizzle with syrup, and serve.

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.
